reviewText: MILL CREEK ENTERTAINMENT's mega-movie packs are always a bargain, and a great way to instantly build or add depth to a video library. Their boxed double-sided DVDs are individually housed in gloss-coated heavy paper sleeves that take up a minimum of space, yet provide excellent protection for the discs. This compactness of design makes possible the storage of literally thousands of films on a single book shelf.The MYSTERY COLLECTION 250 MOVIE PACK offers an enormous sampling of public domain suspense, noir, action and who-dun-it films. At 325 hours this is the longest running DVD box set ever issued. All the big stars of yesteryear are here: Cagney, Welles, Barrymore, Stanwyck, Lugosi, Sinatra, McQueen, Davis, Rooney, Karloff, Brynner, Lamarr, Raft, Widmark, Lorre, Rathbone, Burr, Lombard and dozens more. Many of these are 'B' grade Hollywood product of the 1930s - '50s. There's also a good selection of more recent titles and actors. No matter which era you prefer though, this 250 movie pack is sure to entertain for many months. So, make some popcorn, pull up a chair and if you think you know who did it, please don't tell anybody!All 250 films here have been previously issued by MILL CREEK on smaller packages. These 11 sets are duplicated in their entirety (includes links for 10):MOVIES............SET TITLE(All)ACTION CLASSICS 50 Movie Pack(All)ACTION CLASSICS 100 Movie Pack(All)CRIME CLASSICS 50 Movie Pack(All)DARK CRIMES 50 Movie Pack(All) DETECTIVES 10 Movie Pack(All)GANGSTERS 20 Movie Pack(All)LEGENDARY DETECTIVES 20 Movie Pack(All)MYSTERY CLASSICS 50 Movie Pack(All)MYSTERY CLASSICS 100 Movie Pack(All)SUSPENSE 20 Movie Pack(All)SUSPENSE CLASSICS 50 Movie PackThe balance are contained in part on:MOVIES............SET TITLE(_3) ADVENTURE 10 Movie Pack(_3) ALL STAR 50 Movie Pack(_2) BURNT RUBBER 20 Movie Pack(_1) COMBAT 20 Movie Pack(_6) DIVA 20 Movie Pack(_1) DRIVE-IN CLASSICS 50 Movie Pack(_1) FRIGHT NIGHT 10 Movie Pack(_1) HEROES OF WAR 10 Movie Pack(14) HOLLYWOOD CLASSICS 100 Movie Pack(11) HOLLYWOOD LEGENDS 50 Movie Pack(_1) HORROR CLASSICS 100 Movie Pack(_4) HORROR COLLECTION 250 Movie Pack(_1) NIGHT SCREAMS 50 Movie Pack(_9) ON THE RUN 10 Movie Pack(12) RULE OF THE GUN 20 Movie Pack(_2) SCI-FI CLASSICS 100 Movie Pack(_4) STAR POWER 20 Movie Pack(_1) TALES OF TERROR 50 Movie Pack(_1) ULTIMATE PIRATES Movie Pack(Some titles appear on as many as six of the above twenty-nine sets.)FOR A COMPLETE LIST AND DETAILS OF ALL MOVIES, CHECK COMMENT #1 ON THIS REVIEW (see below)
Title: Mystery 250 Movie Pack

reviewText: Cannot write a review of this as it was a gift for someone who likes Mystery movies - for me, I would not watch it. The recipient of the movie pack, a real Mystery movie enthusiast, unfortunately was run over by a car before I was able to give it to him as a gift. I could not get a refund on what I paid. Unfortunately.

Title: Mystery 250 Movie Pack

reviewText: This huge collection of public domain, mostly b&w films, is a mixed bag. Worthy  movies like Detour, Impact, The Stranger,and others found here, are included in countless other collections by different packagers. But this is the biggest of them all. While it may seem like a great bargain at less than a dollar a disk, more than a few of the movies are not watchable because of poor, noisy  sound and fuzzy images. Mill Creek did not seek out the best prints to dump onto DVD. Also, not all the films in the collection are classic "oldies."  Several are obscure dogs from the 1970s and later. Finally, locating a film in the collection to watch is a pain. Mills Creek did not include an index identifying the location of each film on the 60 disc. You have to thumb through the all the discs and read the contents on both sides of the paper sleeves to locate your movie.
summary: Uneven Collection of B and Film Noir Movies.
Title: Mystery 250 Movie Pack

reviewText: I own several of the millcreek products but this is the best of them so far.  Most of the movies I have seen (no I have not seen them all yet, 250 movies takes quite a bit of television watching time.) have been actually excellent.  I did not expect perfect copies of any of these films when I bought this set, so I have no gripes there.  However, there are a few movies on this set (like other millscreek products) that I will never watch, even though in some cases I have it four or five times on other Millscreek boxset products.So if you are interested in buying just one of their DVD sets this may be the right one for you.
summary: So far the best Millcreek product I have purchased
Title: Mystery 250 Movie Pack

reviewText: This is a great value -- 250 mostly good/fun mystery "B" grade movies.  We're finding it fun to just pick a disk and randomly put it on and watch .....for this price, and the basic age of the films, - well they're perfectly watchable -- definitely good enough and just a super bargain.  I am so glad I found this set.
summary: Excellent Value -- Lots of Good Movies
Title: Mystery 250 Movie Pack

reviewText: enjoy some really great old movies.While I will admit I am a great fan of these Mill Creek sets and have all 4 of the 250 collections (Horror, Family, Westerns & Mystery) along with several of the 50 movie packs this set is by far my favorite of the group. The price is right and pretty much across the board the movies are fun to watch; though there are a few stinkers in the bunch and the quality though not the best always only adds to the ambiance of these great old movies. Top off 250 old mystery movies with great packaging and you have many memorable evenings of good old fashioned fun family entertainment.I you are a video snob and only want completely digitally remastered movies then keep looking because that is not what you are going to get with this or any of the sets Mill Creek has to offer.
Title: Mystery 250 Movie Pack

Title: Mystery 250 Movie Pack

reviewText: Mill Creek does it again with it's 250 Mystery Movie Collection. I paid only 89.99 for this and it was well worth the price. Once again like the 250 Horror Movie Collection, each movie on this collection is about the price of a cheap cup of coffee. And for that price you get such great stars as Basil Rathbone, Bela Lugosi, Lon Chaney Jr and many others. We also get exciting and suspenseful tales of some of the most popular and beloved characters like, Sherlock Holmes, Dick Tracey and even The Shadow. In this 250 movie pack we get gangsters, beautiful dames, intrepid reporters and hard-boiled gumshoe detectives. So, once again, sit back and enjoy hours of suspense, mystery and action from an inexpensive pack of great movies of long ago. Again these aren't HD BLU RAY updated movies but the movies of our parents and grandparents day so don't set your expectations too high and you'll spend hours and hours in film noir bliss.
summary: 250 Suspense Filled Movies For Little Cost
Title: Mystery 250 Movie Pack

reviewText: I bought this used in March for under $40. This is one of the best buys I've ever made. It has everything from Sherlock Holmes and Dick Tracy to minor Noir gems like "Kansas City Confidential" and "He Walks by Night," and even a couple of decent Tarzan films. The price seems to have gone up, but I don't think it is being produced anymore. Get it while you can.
Title: Mystery 250 Movie Pack
